price: Baranakubaza ku byerekeye (iherezo ry’) imisozi (ku munsi w’imperuka). Vuga uti “Nyagasani wanjye azayiritura ihinduke ivumbi ritumuka.”
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡجِبَالِ فَقُلۡ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّي نَسۡفٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿani al-jibāli faqul yansifuhā rabbī nasfan
